title: Enhancing Learning Design Competencies: Design Strategies for Improving Transfer of Learning in Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary nursing theory and practical experience, intermediate-level mathematical proficiency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for applying prior learning content when designing simulation activities.
Learners can analyze problems encountered during simulations using mathematical modeling to propose solutions.
Learners can develop and implement transfer plans to apply simulation experiences to real clinical situations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
